.. selected-content::
   :selections: driver, nodejs

   Install the MongoDB Node.js driver:

   .. code-block:: bash

      npm install mongodb

.. selected-content::
   :selections: driver, python

   Install the MongoDB Python driver:

   .. code-block:: bash

      pip install pymongo

.. selected-content::
   :selections: atlas-cli, none

   Install the Atlas CLI:

   .. code-block:: bash

      brew install mongodb-atlas-cli
